mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM_TBL VALUES(SEQ_ROOM_NO.NEXTVAL, #{roomType}, #{roomArea}, #{roomName}, #{roomAddress}, #{roomPrice}, #{roomTel}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{roomCar}, #{roomLocation}, #{roomGuide}, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM_TBL SET ROOM_PRICE = #{roomPrice}, ROOM_AREA = #{roomArea}, ROOM_ADDRESS = #{roomAddress}, ROOM_TEL = #{roomTel}, ROOM_PERSON = #{roomPerson}, ROOM_PET = #{roomPet}, ROOM_CAR = #{roomCar}, ROOM_LOCATION = #{roomLocation}, ROOM_GUIDE = #{roomGuide} WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
UPDATE ROOMIMG_TBL SET ROOM_FILENAME = #{roomFileName}, ROOM_FILERENAME = #{roomFileRename}, ROOM_FILEPATH = #{roomFilePath} WHERE ROOM_IMG_NO = #{roomImgNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ROOM_TBL WHERE ROOM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ROOM_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROOM_TBL WHERE ROOM_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ROOM_TBL WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND ROOM_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROOM_TBL WHERE ROOM_STATUS = 'Y' AND ROOM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

WITH ROOMS AS (SELECT A.ROOM_NO, B.ROOM_NAME, B.ROOM_ADDRESS, B.ROOM_PRICE, B.ROOM_AREA, B.ROOM_TYPE, B.ROOM_PERSON, B.ROOM_PET, A.ROOM_FILENAME, A.ROOM_FILERENAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.ROOM_NO ORDER BY A.ROOM_NO DESC) AS C_NUM FROM ROOMIMG_TBL A JOIN ROOM_TBL B ON A.ROOM_NO = B.ROOM_NO ORDER BY ROOM_NO) SELECT * FROM ROOMS WHERE C_NUM = 1 AND ROOM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
